title: AIメール監視の仕様
description: AIメール監視システムの仕様を1枚で説明するスライド資料

slides.title: AIメール監視の仕様 - タイトル
slides.description: タイトルスライド。AIメール監視システムの名称とキービジュアル
slides.prompt: Professional presentation title slide with modern design. Large text 'AI Mail Monitoring System Specification' in Japanese. Blue to purple gradient background. Email icon with AI eye symbol. Clean, corporate style. 16:9 aspect ratio.

slides.title: システム概要
slides.description: AIメール監視システムの全体像と目的を説明
slides.prompt: Professional diagram showing AI email monitoring system overview. Central AI brain connected to email servers, analysis modules, and alert systems. Japanese labels. Blue and purple color scheme. Clean infographic style. 16:9 aspect ratio.

slides.title: 監視フロー
slides.description: メール受信から分析、アラートまでの処理フロー
slides.prompt: Flowchart diagram showing email monitoring process flow. Steps: Email Reception → AI Analysis → Threat Detection → Alert Notification. Arrows connecting each step. Japanese text labels. Green accent color for active monitoring. Professional infographic style. 16:9 aspect ratio.

slides.title: AI分析機能
slides.description: AI分析の詳細機能（スパム検知、フィッシング検知、異常検知）
slides.prompt: Professional infographic showing AI analysis features. Three main modules: Spam Detection, Phishing Detection, Anomaly Detection. Each with icons and brief descriptions in Japanese. Neural network visualization in background. Blue color scheme. Modern tech style. 16:9 aspect ratio.

slides.title: アラート機能
slides.description: 異常検知時の通知方法（メール、Slack、ダッシュボード）
slides.prompt: Professional diagram showing alert notification system. Multiple notification channels: Email alerts, Slack integration, Dashboard notifications, SMS alerts. Icons for each channel. Orange accent color for urgency. Japanese labels. Clean corporate design. 16:9 aspect ratio.

slides.title: 運用と管理
slides.description: 管理ダッシュボード、設定画面、レポート機能
slides.prompt: Professional dashboard interface mockup for email monitoring system. Multiple panels showing: Real-time monitoring graph, Settings panel, Report generation section, User management area. Japanese UI labels. Purple and blue color scheme. Modern web dashboard design. 16:9 aspect ratio.
